AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Forest child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed the world around [PAWN_possessive] tribe's land. [PAWN_pronoun] found happiness in the quiet forests away from the other [PAWN_alienRace]s. [PAWN_possessive] days were full of playing with wild animals and looking at beautiful flowers.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Lone child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was not a well loved [PAWN_alienRace]. [PAWN_pronoun] was left alone by the other younglings, not invited to play games and have fun. [PAWN_possessive] time was spent with the tribe's animals, tending to them, or helping [PAWN_possessive]'s parents with making trinkets.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Social child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a well loved [PAWN_alienRace]. [PAWN_possessive]'s days were full of games, play fighting, and having fun.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Farm child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] helped around [PAWN_possessive] tribe's fields, taking care of plants and animals. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed the outdoors and fresh air.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mining child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] liked to dig holes when [PAWN_pronoun] was a hatchling. [PAWN_possessive] love for making holes did not stop as [PAWN_pronoun] got older, helping to dig tunnels and decorate the walls.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Bratty child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a brat growing up. [PAWN_pronoun] liked to pick on other younglings, throw rocks, and get into fights. [PAWN_pronoun] would sometimes find and make fun of lonely [PAWN_alienRace]s.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Artistic child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was often found making a mess of things. [PAWN_pronoun] was always covered from head to tail in mud from making [PAWN_possessive] artistic mounds of dirt wherever water was found. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed showing off [PAWN_possessive] latest creations to anyone that passed by.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Fire child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a passion for fire, frequently being on the wrong end of a fiery stick. This never stopped [PAWN_objective] from playing with it; [PAWN_pronoun] loved to cook little critters, usually the salamanders that were found around the logs, and danced with lit sticks to show off.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Rock child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] would often play in the rock fields outside the mines, digging through the large chunks to find that one stone that [PAWN_pronoun] could skip across water the farthest.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Child refugee
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced from [PAWN_possessive] lands when [PAWN_pronoun] was a youngling, traveling with other [PAWN_alienRace]s from place to place searching for a new land to call home.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of [PAWN_possessive] tribe's hunters. [PAWN_pronoun] often tracked down animals deep in the wilds to be tamed or hunted other animals to be killed for food. When not in the wilds around [PAWN_possessive] village, [PAWN_pronoun] would help tend and train the tribe's animals.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold warrior
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] helped guard [PAWN_possessive] tribe from attacking animals and the mean tallfolk. [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to use whacky sticks, stabby shinies, and rock throwers to stop the bad things from killing [PAWN_possessive] yipkin.\n\nIt was rare, but sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] would go out into the big world with a some other [PAWN_alienRace]s. They would attack other mean things, rescue a [PAWN_alienRace] from danger, or even search for new places full of shinies.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked the fields day in and day out; plowing soil, planting the crops, and harvesting the fruits of [PAWN_possessive] labor. When there was down time, [PAWN_possessive] raised the tribe's animals, training them to help around the village. [PAWN_pronoun] kept the animals happy and the plants tall so that [PAWN_possessive] tribe could live a peaceful life.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold crafter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] would often create the tools, clothing, and trinkets for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] loved to take the different materials around [PAWN_possessive] and turn it into something wonderful. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed decorating [PAWN_possessive] crafts, putting [PAWN_possessive] own touch on them. Every once in a while [PAWN_pronoun] would get an idea stuck in [PAWN_possessive] noggin and would craft beautiful shapes for all [PAWN_possessive] tribekin to admire.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold digger
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] could be found digging deep tunnels in the dirt and rock, finding shinies and lots of very hard rocks. [PAWN_pronoun] felt happiest when all [PAWN_pronoun] could hear was the sound of [PAWN_possessive] shovel and pick against the ground. When [PAWN_nameDef] was not busy mining, [PAWN_pronoun] could be found building the stools and workshops that [PAWN_possessive] tribekin would use.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold spirit healer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a spiritual [PAWN_alienRace]. [PAWN_pronoun] would help the elders with dances and stories around the large fires of [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] would frequently help the hurt tribal members that were injured from attacking animals and tallfolk. [PAWN_nameDef] loved talking to everyone and enjoyed keeping [PAWN_possessive] yipkin happy.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold fire tender
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] tended the various fires around [PAWN_possessive] village. [PAWN_pronoun] would often go out into the wilds around [PAWN_possessive] village to harvest the wood for the fires. Besides keeping the fires lit, [PAWN_pronoun] would cook for [PAWN_possessive] fellow villagers, using anything somewhat edible that [PAWN_pronoun] could find.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold refugee
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a refugee in search for a new place to call home. [PAWN_pronoun] saw many lands; from the cold and white north, to the icky and sticky swamps, and even the large piles of hot, coarse sands that [PAWN_pronoun] could not get out of [PAWN_possessive] shoes and trinkets.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold elder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a well-respected tribal elder. While [PAWN_possessive] wisdom was important to the tribe, the tenets of living a full life were a familiar and cherished subject to all [PAWN_alienRace]s who visited [PAWN_objective]. While [PAWN_nameDef] may be old and never wielded a whacky stick or a stabby shiny, [PAWN_pronoun] had lived a full life, passing down [PAWN_possessive] many experiences and amazing tales to yipkin, young and old.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold chieftain
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the chieftain of [PAWN_possessive] tribe for quite a long time. [PAWN_pronoun] helped rally [PAWN_possessive] fellow [PAWN_alienRace]s to face scary dangers and overcome big problems. [PAWN_pronoun] was a good leader that quickly took charge when [PAWN_possessive] tribe needed help and was very well loved by them. [PAWN_nameDef] was often found giving advice, cheering up others when needed, and helping out all around [PAWN_possessive] tribe.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold tinkerer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a sharp-eyed [PAWN_alienRace]; often full of insight into the workings of other races. Where other [PAWN_alienRace]s would turn an old ruin they found into a refuge, [PAWN_pronoun] saw an opportunity to learn how old things worked mechanically. This lead [PAWN_possessive] to experiment with designs and ideas often considered unusual, weird, and sometimes just plain bizarre by [PAWN_possessive] tribekin.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold painter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an artistic [PAWN_alienRace], prone to wild flights of fantasy using everything from firepit charcoal to dyes hand-made from local plants and mushrooms and even scraps from the previous night’s dinner. No cave wall was safe when [PAWN_pronoun] was inspired to paint whatever was on [PAWN_possessive] mind at the time.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] even learned to turn mud and rocks into beautiful depiction of [PAWN_possessive] current mindset, which were loved not only by [PAWN_objective], but [PAWN_possessive] tribekin as well.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold bullfrogs-eye
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an alert [PAWN_alienRace] known for [PAWN_possessive] exceptional aim, from being able to skip stones better than the rest of [PAWN_possessive] tribe and always finding the best targets when hunting for food. [PAWN_pronoun] was an exceptional shot; like a frog, snatching a fly right out of the air, and even knew ways to make something yummy out of spooky things that were being mean to [PAWN_possessive] tribe.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Child slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured when [PAWN_pronoun] was a small hatchling. [PAWN_possessive] life was full of sadness and pain, forced to work from when [PAWN_pronoun] could walk. [PAWN_nameDef]'s master would punish [PAWN_possessive] with painful ouchies to [PAWN_possessive] mind when [PAWN_pronoun] did something wrong. [PAWN_pronoun] had no [PAWN_alienRace]s to call yipkin as [PAWN_pronoun] grew.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold laborer slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced to work from before the sun rose to after the sun had set for [PAWN_possessive] master. [PAWN_pronoun] was often underground mining out shiny ores, in the fields working tall plants, tending to massive animals, or building what [PAWN_possessive] master wanted.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold crafter slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was kept in hot, dry, dusty buildings creating anything from trinkets, to stabby metals and shiny shells. When [PAWN_pronoun] was not creating things for [PAWN_possessive] master, [PAWN_nameDef] was forced to build big objects and tend to [PAWN_possessive] fellow wounded slaves.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold warrior slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was taught how to fight for [PAWN_possessive] master. [PAWN_pronoun] fought with shiny stabbies and heavy whackies that were taken from [PAWN_possessive] downed meanies. [PAWN_pronoun] was always sent into fights first to take beatings before the not-slaves finished off the baddies. [PAWN_nameDef] somehow survived all [PAWN_possessive] battles, but not without long lasting ouchies.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold servant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a servant in [PAWN_possessive] owner's large house. [PAWN_pronoun] was not the only one owned by [PAWN_possessive] master, but [PAWN_pronoun] always got the worst jobs. The small [PAWN_alienRace] often had to clean up after the animals, guests, and [PAWN_possessive] master; no matter how icky it was. When [PAWN_pronoun] was not cleaning, [PAWN_pronoun] helped the cooks; doing all the dirty work for them and was punished for anything, even if it was not [PAWN_possessive] fault. It was a good day when [PAWN_pronoun] was sent to the fields. There, [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to gather fruits from small, prickly bushes that the other slaves could not without them getting hurt.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold maid
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a maid for a substantially wealthy owner with a peculiar taste in tailed servants. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught how to speak eloquently, prepare the finest meals, tend to ailments, and entertain [PAWN_possessive] master's guests. [PAWN_nameDef], in addition to [PAWN_possessive] regular duties, made sure [PAWN_possessive] master's armaments were properly polished. \n\n[PAWN_pronoun] swears [PAWN_pronoun] is just a simple maid and nothing more.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: newborn
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a baby. [PAWN_possessive] life revolves around milk and naps.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a child. The story of [PAWN_possessive] childhood is still being written.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in our tribe.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: vatgrown child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood in a growth vat.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tribe member
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became an adult in our tribe. [PAWN_possessive] story is still being written.

RimWorldChildren.BackstoryDef.title: Cutebold baby
RimWorldChildren.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a baby [PAWN_alienRace] born into this cruel rimworld. [PAWN_possessive] story has not been written yet.

RimWorldChildren.BackstoryDef.title: Village child
RimWorldChildren.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a [PAWN_alienRace] child that was born into this cruel rimworld. [PAWN_possessive] story is starting to be written.

RimWorldChildren.BackstoryDef.title: Cutebold villager
RimWorldChildren.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a villager who grew up on this rimworld. [PAWN_possessive] story is ever growing.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cutebold villager
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a child who grew up on this rimworld. [PAWN_possessive] story is ever growing.
